Texto: 
non-contributory
preoperative embolization and surgery
• enhancing destructive mass arising from the jugular foramen and with extension in the jugular vein.  

• the angiogram reveals a vascular tumor fed by the external carotid artery and muscular branches of the ipsilateral vertebral artery.
glomus glomus jugulare tumor (paraganglioma)
• glomus jugulare tumor
• metastatic disease
• vagus nerve schwannoma
59 y.o. woman with a long history of ear pain and a pulsatile neck mass.
